mapper.select: select * from restrt order by restrt_id desc
mapper.insert: insert into restrt(restrt_id, sigun_id, category_id, RESTRT_NM, REFINE_ROADNM_ADDR) values(#{restrt_id}, #{sigun_id}, #{category_id}, #{RESTRT_NM}, #{REFINE_ROADNM_ADDR})
mapper.update: update restrt set sigun_id=#{sigun_id} category_id=#{category_id}, RESTRT_NM=#{RESTRT_NM}, REFINE_ROADNM_ADDR=#{REFINE_ROADNM_ADDR} where restrt_id=#{restrt_id}
